text: Suraj Mandal is an Indian footballer who plays as a midfielder. Mandal has played in the I-League with Mohun Bagan and United. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian footballers Category:Mohun Bagan A.C. players Category:Southern Samity players Category:United S.C. players Category:Association football midfielders Category:I-League players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Suraj Mandal (footballer)
